languages.text: {n}Октавиана нежно улыбается.{/n} "Если явятся, я скорее "Стойкость мученика" подорву, но живой этим палачам в руки не дамся. А пока буду стоять за стойкой и заправлять своих забулдыг горючим. Скверно это, когда капитан с корабля бежит, не так ли, Ваша Светлость?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Октавиана нежно улыбается.{/n} "Если явятся, я скорее "Стойкость мученика" подорву, но живой этим палачам в руки не дамся. А пока буду стоять за стойкой и заправлять своих забулдыг горючим. Скверно это, когда капитан с корабля бежит, не так ли, Ваша Светлость?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana smiles tenderly.{/n} "If they show up, I'll blow up the Martyr's Endurance before I let those butchers take me alive. And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана нежно улыбается.{/n} "Если явятся, я скорее "Стойкость мученика" подорву, но живой этим палачам в руки не дамся. А пока буду стоять за стойкой и заправлять своих забулдыг горючим. Скверно это, когда капитан с корабля бежит, не так ли, Ваша Светлость?"

And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜温柔迪笑了起来。{/n}“如果他们敢来的话，我就炸了殉道之魂号，绝不会落在那群屠夫手里，至于现在，我还得站在吧台后面，为我手下这群无赖打气。如果舰长弃船而去，那恐怕就太不光彩了。是这样吧，大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana smiles tenderly.{/n} "If they show up, I'll blow up the Martyr's Endurance before I let those butchers take me alive. And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜温柔迪笑了起来。{/n}“如果他们敢来的话，我就炸了殉道之魂号，绝不会落在那群屠夫手里，至于现在，我还得站在吧台后面，为我手下这群无赖打气。如果舰长弃船而去，那恐怕就太不光彩了。是这样吧，大人？”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナは優しく微笑む。{/n}「もしあいつらが現れたら、捕まる前に殉教者の忍耐を爆撃するわ。今のところはまだ、バーのカウンターで酔っ払いに酒を提供していますよ。船長が自身の船を捨てるのは正しくないことでしょう？ね、陛下？」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana smiles tenderly.{/n} "If they show up, I'll blow up the Martyr's Endurance before I let those butchers take me alive. And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナは優しく微笑む。{/n}「もしあいつらが現れたら、捕まる前に殉教者の忍耐を爆撃するわ。今のところはまだ、バーのカウンターで酔っ払いに酒を提供していますよ。船長が自身の船を捨てるのは正しくないことでしょう？ね、陛下？」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana sonríe con ternura.{/n} «Si aparecen, volaré la Resistencia del Mártir antes de dejar que esos carniceros me cojan viva. De momento estaré detrás de la barra reabasteciendo a mis matones. Es una putada que una capitana abandone su nave, ¿verdad, mi{mf|lord|lady}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana smiles tenderly.{/n} "If they show up, I'll blow up the Martyr's Endurance before I let those butchers take me alive. And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana sonríe con ternura.{/n} «Si aparecen, volaré la Resistencia del Mártir antes de dejar que esos carniceros me cojan viva. De momento estaré detrás de la barra reabasteciendo a mis matones. Es una putada que una capitana abandone su nave, ¿verdad, mi{mf|lord|lady}?».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana lächelt sanft.{/n} "Wenn sie auftauchen, jage ich die Martyr's Endurance lieber in die Luft, bevor ich mich von diesen Schlächtern lebendig schnappen lasse. Aber jetzt bin ich erst einmal in der Bar und tanke meine Raubeine neu. Es ist schrecklich, wenn ein Captain sein Schiff aufgibt, nicht wahr, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft?"
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana smiles tenderly.{/n} "If they show up, I'll blow up the Martyr's Endurance before I let those butchers take me alive. And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana lächelt sanft.{/n} "Wenn sie auftauchen, jage ich die Martyr's Endurance lieber in die Luft, bevor ich mich von diesen Schlächtern lebendig schnappen lasse. Aber jetzt bin ich erst einmal in der Bar und tanke meine Raubeine neu. Es ist schrecklich, wenn ein Captain sein Schiff aufgibt, nicht wahr, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana vous sourit tendrement.{/n} « S'ils viennent, je suis prête à faire sauter l'Endurance du Martyr plutôt que de laisser ces bouchers me prendre vivante. Pour le moment, je reste derrière le bar et j'abreuve mes piliers de comptoir. Un capitaine n'abandonne pas son navire, pas vrai, Votre Seigneurie ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana smiles tenderly.{/n} "If they show up, I'll blow up the Martyr's Endurance before I let those butchers take me alive. And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana vous sourit tendrement.{/n} « S'ils viennent, je suis prête à faire sauter le Fortitude du Martyr plutôt que de laisser ces bouchers me prendre vivante. Pour le moment, je reste derrière le bar et j'abreuve mes piliers de comptoir. Un capitaine n'abandonne pas son navire, pas vrai, Votre Seigneurie ? »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana nazikçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "O canilere canlı yakalanmaktansa Şehit Sabrı'nı havaya uçururum. Günüm gelene dek tezgâhın ardında külhanilerime içki dağıtacağım. Bir kaptanın gemisini terk etmesi adilik olur, değil mi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri?"
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana smiles tenderly.{/n} "If they show up, I'll blow up the Martyr's Endurance before I let those butchers take me alive. And for now, I'll be behind the bar, refuelling my roughnecks. It's a rotten thing for a captain to abandon ship, isn't it, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana nazikçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "O canilere canlı yakalanmaktansa Şehit Sabrı'nı havaya uçururum. Günüm gelene dek tezgâhın ardında külhanilerime içki dağıtacağım. Bir kaptanın gemisini terk etmesi adilik olur, değil mi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
